name.ja: <ruby>見えざる手<rt>ヘカトンケイル</rt></ruby>マキブエル
name.zh-CN: 百臂无形手 马基卜揶尔

text.en: If this card battles a monster, neither can be destroyed by that battle. You can only use each of the following effects of "Hecahands Makibel" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; Fusion Summon 1 "Hecahands" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field, including this card in the hand. If an Illusion Fusion Monster(s) is sent to your GY while this card is in your GY: You can add this card to your hand.
